# largeContentImageInsets

**Instance Property**

Insets to adjust the position of the item’s image so it appears visually centered in the large content viewer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var largeContentImageInsets: UIEdgeInsets { get }
```

## Discussion

This property defaults to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEdgeInsets/zero].

## Configuring display properties

- **largeContentTitle**: A string that describes an item to display in the large content viewer.
- **largeContentImage**: An image that represents an item to display in the large content viewer.
- **scalesLargeContentImage**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view scales the item’s image to a larger size or not.
